scripts.generate-keys: echo APP_KEYS=`openssl rand -base64 16`,`openssl rand -base64 16`,`openssl rand -base64 16`,`openssl rand -base64 16` >> .env && echo API_TOKEN_SALT=`openssl rand -base64 16` >> .env && echo ADMIN_JWT_SECRET=`openssl rand -base64 16` >> .env && echo JWT_SECRET=`openssl rand -base64 16` >> .env
scripts.start:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production strapi start
